oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Epaulets, buttons, and photograph of William Preston Graves
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Epaulets and buttons from the uniform belonging to Captain William Preston Graves, U. S. Included is a photograph of Captain Graves in uniform. The photographer was H. D. Stowe of Louisville.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
